articles.author: Jon Brodkin
articles.title: FTX sues Binance for $1.76B in battle of crypto exchanges founded by convicts - Ars Technica
articles.description: Lawsuit seeks “at least $1.76 billion that was fraudulently transferred” by SBF.

articles.title: Infection Aftershock: COVID-19’s Long-Term Impact on Your Heart - SciTechDaily
articles.description: New research indicates that people who contracted COVID-19 early in the pandemic faced a significantly elevated risk of heart attack, stroke, and death for up to three years post-infection. Those with severe cases saw nearly quadruple the risk, especially in …
articles.content: Research shows that early COVID-19 infections significantly increased the risk of cardiovascular events over three years, suggesting severe cases could be as detrimental as diabetes to heart health.… [+6132 chars]
